mechanics.condition: Caster chooses an unoccupied space within range that they can see
mechanics.outcome: A Large spectral guardian appears, hovers, and occupies the chosen space for the spell's duration

mechanics.condition: Creature is hostile to caster AND creature moves into a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn
mechanics.outcome: Creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw

mechanics.condition: Total damage dealt by the guardian reaches 60

description_text: A Large spectral guardian appears and hovers for the duration in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The guardian occupies that space and is indistinct except for a gleaming sword and shield emblazoned with the symbol of your deity. Any creature hostile to you that moves to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn must succeed on a dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 20 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The guardian vanishes when it has dealt a total of 60 damage.
